text.div:
Structure
LinkIdTextCardinalityTypeFlagsDescription & Constraints
eRequesteRequest.Questionnairehttps://smartforms.csiro.au/ig/Questionnaire/eRequest#0.1.0
tab-containernull0..1group
patientPatient Details0..1group
idnull0..1stringDefinition: Patient.id
Expressions:
  • Initial Value: %patient.id
patient-nameName0..1stringExpressions:
  • Initial Value: (%patient.name.where(use='official').select(((prefix | given).join(' ') | family).join(' ').where($this != '') | text) | %patient.name.select(((prefix | given).join(' ') | family).join(' ').where($this != '') | text)).first()
patient-genderAdministrative gender0..1choiceValue Set: AdministrativeGender
Expressions:
  • Initial Value: %patient.gender
patient-sexSex assigned at birth0..1choiceValue Set: Biological Sex
Expressions:
  • Initial Value: %patient.extension.where(exists(url='http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/individual-recordedSexOrGender' and extension.where(exists(url='type' and valueCodeableConcept.coding.code='1515311000168102')))).extension.where(url='value').valueCodeableConcept.coding
patient-dobDate of birth0..1dateExpressions:
  • Initial Value: %patient.birthDate
patient-ageAge0..1integerExpressions:
  • Initial Value: iif(today().toString().select(substring(5,2) & substring(8,2)).toInteger() > %patient.birthDate.toString().select(substring(5,2) & substring(8,2)).toInteger(), today().toString().substring(0,4).toInteger() - %patient.birthDate.toString().substring(0,4).toInteger(), today().toString().substring(0,4).toInteger() - %patient.birthDate.toString().substring(0,4).toInteger() - 1)
radiology-requesterRequester details0..1group
radiology-requester-namePractitioner name0..1stringExpressions:
  • Initial Value: %user.name.text
radiology-requester-providernumberProvider number0..*stringExpressions:
  • Initial Value: %PractitionerRole.entry.resource.identifier.where(system = 'http://ns.electronichealth.net.au/id/medicare-provider-number').value
radiology-requester-organisationRequester organisation0..1group
radiology-requester-organisation-nameRequester organisation name0..1stringExpressions:
  • Initial Value: %PractitionerRole.entry.resource.organization.display
radiology-requester-organisation-identifierRequester organisation identifier0..1stringExpressions:
  • Initial Value: %PractitionerRole.entry.resource.organization.identifier.where(system = 'http://ns.electronichealth.net.au/id/hi/hpio/1.0').value
clinicalsummaryClinical summary0..1group
clinicalsummary-device-tableImplanted medical device summary0..*group
clinicalsummary-device-table-typeType1..1stringExpressions:
  • Initial Value: %DeviceRepeat.type.text
clinicalsummary-device-table-statusStatus0..1choiceOptions: 2 options
Expressions:
  • Initial Value: %DeviceRepeat.status
clinicalsummary-device-table-commentComment0..1stringExpressions:
  • Initial Value: %DeviceRepeat.note.text
clinicalsummary-problemdiagnosis-tableProblem/diagnosis summary0..*group
clinicalsummary-problemdiagnosis-table-nameName1..1open-choiceValue Set: Clinical Condition
Expressions:
  • Initial Value: %ConditionRepeat.code.select((coding.where(system='http://snomed.info/sct') | coding.where(system!='http://snomed.info/sct').first() | text ).first())
clinicalsummary-problemdiagnosis-table-bodysiteBody site0..1open-choiceValue Set: Body Site
Expressions:
  • Initial Value: %ConditionRepeat.bodySite[0].coding
clinicalsummary-problemdiagnosis-table-statusClinical status0..1open-choiceValue Set: Condition Clinical Status Codes
Expressions:
  • Initial Value: %ConditionRepeat.clinicalStatus.coding
clinicalsummary-problemdiagnosis-table-commentComment0..1stringExpressions:
  • Initial Value: %ConditionRepeat.note.text
clinicalsummary-adversereactionAdverse reaction risk summary0..*group
clinicalsummary-adversereaction-substanceSubstance1..1open-choiceValue Set: Adverse Reaction Agent
Expressions:
  • Initial Value: %AllergyIntoleranceRepeat.code.select((coding.where(system='http://snomed.info/sct') | coding.where(system!='http://snomed.info/sct').first() | text ).first())
clinicalsummary-adversereaction-manifestationManifestation0..*open-choiceValue Set: http://snomed.info/sct/32506021000036107?fhir_vs=refset/142341000036103
Expressions:
  • Initial Value: %AllergyIntoleranceRepeat.reaction.manifestation.coding
clinicalsummary-adversereaction-commentComment0..1stringExpressions:
  • Initial Value: %AllergyIntoleranceRepeat.note.text
radiologyMedical imaging0..1group
radiology-providerProvider0..1group
radiology-provider-nameProvider name0..1choiceOptions: 3 options
radiology-serviceService details0..*group
radiology-service-examinationnull0..*group
radiology-service-examination-procedureExamination procedure0..1group
radiology-service-examination-procedure-instructionsUse this item to represent the examination procedure as a single field, otherwise use "Examination components".0..1display
radiology-service-examination-procedure-procedureTest name0..1open-choiceValue Set: http://ranzcr.com/fhir/ValueSet/radiology-services-1
radiology-service-examination-componentsExamination components0..1group
radiology-service-examination-components-instructionsUse this groups of items to represent the examination procedure as multiple components, otherwise use "Examination procedure".0..1display
radiology-service-examination-components-servicetypeModality0..1open-choiceValue Set: http://ranzcr.com/fhir/ValueSet/radiology-procedure-1
radiology-service-examination-components-bodysiteBody site0..1open-choiceValue Set: Body Site
radiology-service-examination-components-bodysite-instructionsInclude lateralised body site where appropriate0..1display
radiology-service-examination-components-contrastContrast0..1boolean
radiology-service-examination-components-contrast-instructionsLeave unanswered if no specific instruction0..1display
radiology-service-examination-priorityUrgency0..1choiceOptions: 3 options
radiology-service-examination-timingService due0..1string
radiology-service-clinicalindicationClinical indication0..*open-choiceValue Set: Reason for Request
radiology-service-clinicalnotesClinical context0..1text
radiology-service-commentComment0..1text
radiology-protocolProtocol0..1group
radiology-protocol-distributionlistDistribution list0..*string
radiology-protocol-urgentcontactUrgent contact0..*string
radiology-protocol-billingguidanceBilling guidance0..1string
pathologyPathology0..1group
pathology-providerProvider0..1group
pathology-provider-nameProvider name0..1choiceOptions: 3 options
pathology-serviceService details0..*group
pathology-service-testdetailsTest details0..*group
pathology-service-testdetails-testnameTest name1..1open-choiceValue Set: RCPA - SPIA Requesting Pathology Terminology Reference Set
pathology-service-testdetails-fastingFasting0..1boolean
pathology-service-testdetails-fasting-instructionsLeave unanswered if no specific instruction0..1display
pathology-service-testdetails-priorityUrgency0..1choiceOptions: 3 options
pathology-service-testdetails-timingService due0..1string
pathology-service-clinicalindicationClinical indication0..*open-choiceValue Set: Reason for Request
pathology-service-clinicalnotesClinical context0..1text
pathology-service-commentComment0..1text
pathology-protocolProtocol0..1group
pathology-protocol-distributionlistDistribution list0..*string
pathology-protocol-urgentcontactUrgent contact0..*string
pathology-protocol-billingguidanceBilling guidance0..1string

Documentation for this format

Option Sets

Answer options for clinicalsummary-device-table-status

  • http://hl7.org/fhir/device-status#active ("Current")
  • http://hl7.org/fhir/device-status#inactive ("Past")

Answer options for radiology-provider-name

  • Scans-R-Us
  • Imaging Hub
  • Radiology Bros

Answer options for radiology-service-examination-priority

  • http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority#stat ("Emergency")
  • http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority#urgent ("Urgent")
  • http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority#routine ("Routine")

Answer options for pathology-provider-name

  • Tests-R-Us
  • Diagnostics Hub
  • Pathology Bros

Answer options for pathology-service-testdetails-priority

  • http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority#stat ("Emergency")
  • http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority#urgent ("Urgent")
  • http://hl7.org/fhir/request-priority#routine ("Routine")

extension.valueString: The patient that is to be used to pre-populate the form
The practitioner user that is to be used to pre-populate the form

valueExpression.expression: (%patient.name.where(use='official').select(((prefix | given).join(' ') | family).join(' ').where($this != '') | text) | %patient.name.select(((prefix | given).join(' ') | family).join(' ').where($this != '') | text)).first()

item.text: Use this item to represent the examination procedure as a single field, otherwise use "Examination components".

extension.valueString: Use this item to represent the examination procedure as a single field.

item.text: Use this groups of items to represent the examination procedure as multiple components, otherwise use "Examination procedure".

extension.valueString: Use this groups of items to represent the examination procedure as multiple components.

item.text: Include lateralised body site where appropriate
Leave unanswered if no specific instruction
Leave unanswered if no specific instruction
